葓字的基本解释

葓
hóng
即“蕹菜”。
同“荭”。

葓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hóng］
［《廣韻》户公切，平東，匣。］
(1)同“葒”。水草名。
(2)菜名。即蕹菜。
(3)同“篊”。拦河渔具。

葓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　葓； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1044第19
【唐韻】戸公切【韻會】胡公切，?音紅。【玉篇】水草也。【北史·慕容儼傳】造荻葓竟數里，以塞船路。

葓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
葓字的起名意思

1、[葓草]又名"水荭"。一年生草本。供观赏。果实可供药用；2、[葓菜]也叫"蕹菜"，俗称"空心菜"。一年生草本，可供食用。

葓
Basic explanation of words
葓
hóng
That is "water spinach".
Same as "Xiao".
葓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hóng］
["Guangyun" Hu Gongqie, Pingdong, Xie. ]
(1) Same as "Xiang". The name of the aquatic plants.
(2) The name of the dish. That is water spinach.
(3) Same as "篊". Barrage fishing gear.
葓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　葓; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1044 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Gong Gong cut [Rhyme Club] Hu Gong cut, with red tone. [Jade articles] Water plants are also. [Northern History·Murong Yan's Biography] Countless miles to build a boat.
葓
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
葓
Name meaning
1. [Araliaceae] is also known as "Water Orion". Annual herb. For viewing. The fruit can be used for medicinal purposes; 2. [葓菜] is also called "water spinach", commonly known as "water spinach". Annual herb, available for consumption.
